original_text: Very soon, Lebanon's forest will become a field of fruit trees. And the field of fruit trees will seem like a forest. Very soon, Lebanon's forest will become a field of fruit trees. And the field of fruit trees will seem like a forest.
korean_text: 오래지 아니하여 레바논이 기름진 밭으로 변하지 아니하겠으며 기름진 밭이 숲으로 여겨지지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Lebanon's forest will become a field of fruit trees
sentences.korean_translation: 레바논의 숲이 과일 나무 밭이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And the field of fruit trees will seem like a forest
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 과일 나무 밭은 숲처럼 보일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Lebanon's forest will become a field of fruit trees
sentences.korean_translation: 레바논의 숲이 과일 나무 밭이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And the field of fruit trees will seem like a forest
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 과일 나무 밭은 숲처럼 보일 것입니다
